message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think it's a good starting point.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the situation.  Don't forget, the value decreases for both of us each round.
I understand your point, Bob, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but 58-42 is the most I can go.
Alice, this is eating into both our potential gains. 52/48 is my final offer. Let's close this deal before the money shrinks further for you.
